name: Ganster Tycoon
description:
This click game is tailor-made for you, boss! Just a few clicks, your partners will collect all the wealth for you in your area.

Live like a business tycoon, tapping the screen is your greatest asset.
Whenever and wherever, click a little, wait a little, you can receive huge amounts of cash.
Use the money accumulated by your partner to upgrade your business and areas.
Make money, accumulate profits, and buy whatever you want.

Enjoying the unprecedented experience of becoming the largest gangsters in the world!
